official_title: Prevention of Heart Failure Induced by Doxorubicin With Early Administration of Dexrazoxane in Patients With Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Women,
* Age 18-65,
* Not pregnant, Not currently breast feeding
* No current illness,
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnancy, currently breast feeding
* Current illness,
* History of cardiac, or renal disease
